message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, it's valued at $12000 by us. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $10500, hoping to provide you with an opportunity to experience its benefits at a discounted rate. I look forward to your consideration. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.
